name: autosub-ext3
description: Using speech recognition and machine translation to generate subtitles for videos.

scripts.mkdirs: mkdir -p debug ; mkdir -p release ; mkdir -p debug/images ; mkdir -p release/images ; mkdir -p debug/icons ; mkdir -p release/icons
scripts.copy:icon: find src/icons -name '*.png' -type f -exec cp {} debug/icons \; && find src/icons -name '*.png' -type f -exec cp {} release/icons \;
scripts.copy:images: find src/images -name '*.png' -type f -exec cp {} debug/images \; && find src/images -name '*.png' -type f -exec cp {} release/images \;
scripts.copy:images:svg: find src/images -name '*.svg' -type f -exec cp {} debug/images \; && find src/images -name '*.svg' -type f -exec cp {} release/images \;
scripts.copy:html: find src -name '*.html' -type f -exec cp {} debug \; && find src -name '*.html' -type f -exec cp {} release \;
scripts.copy:css: find src -name '*.css' -type f -exec cp {} debug \; && find src -name '*.css' -type f -exec cp {} release \;
scripts.copy:json: cp src/manifest.json debug/ && cp src/manifest.json release/
scripts.copy:debug_js: cp -t debug  src/jquery-3.4.1.min.js src/jquery-ui.min.js src/hideShowPassword.min.js src/video-js.min.js src/notify.js src/notify-metro.js
scripts.copy:release_js: cp -t release src/jquery-3.4.1.min.js  src/jquery-ui.min.js src/hideShowPassword.min.js src/video-js.min.js
scripts.locales:d_cpm: cp -r debug/_locales/en debug/_locales/en_US ; cp -r debug/_locales/en debug/_locales/en_GB ; cp -r debug/_locales/es debug/_locales/es_419 ; cp -r debug/_locales/pt debug/_locales/pt_BR
scripts.locales:d_mv: mv debug/_locales/zh-TW debug/_locales/zh_TW ; mv debug/_locales/zh-CN debug/_locales/zh_CN ; mv debug/_locales/pt debug/_locales/pt_PT
scripts.copy: npm-run-all copy:icon copy:images copy:images:svg copy:html copy:css copy:json copy:debug_js copy:release_js
scripts.locales: npm-run-all locales:d_cp locales:d_rm locales:d_cpm locales:d_mv locales:r_cp
scripts.build:debug: npm-run-all clean mkdirs copy locales build:d1 build:d2 build:d3 build:d4 build:d5 build:d6 build:d7 build:d8 build:d9
scripts.build:release: npm-run-all build:debug build:r1 build:r2 build:r3 build:r4 build:r5 build:r6 build:r7 build:r8 build:r9 build:ra build:rb
